description: '''Simon Katz''' (born 16 May 1971) is an English songwriter and multi-instrumentalist, best known for his work with the band [[Jamiroquai]] from 1995 to 2000. Katz has been nominated for 2 Grammy Awards and was a recipient of the [[Grammy Award]] for Best Pop Performance by a Duo Or Group With Vocal for Jamiroquai's "[[Virtual Insanity]]" in 1997, and the [[Ivor Novello Award]] for Outstanding Song Collection with Jamiroquai in 1999.
